metadata.Title: CVE-2023-6857 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
When resolving a symlink, a race may occur where the buffer passed to`readlink` may actually be smaller than necessary.*This bug only affects Firefox on Unix-based operating systems (Android,Linux, MacOS). Windows is unaffected.* This vulnerability affects FirefoxESR < 115.6, Thunderbird < 115.6, and Firefox < 121.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-6857` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 121.0+build1-0ubuntu0.20.04.1
firefox-geckodriver - 121.0+build1-0ubuntu0.20.04.1
firefox-mozsymbols - 121.0+build1-0ubuntu0.20.04.1
No subscription required

thunderbird - 1:115.6.0+build2-0ubuntu0.20.04.1
thunderbird-gnome-support - 1:115.6.0+build2-0ubuntu0.20.04.1
thunderbird-mozsymbols - 1:115.6.0+build2-0ubuntu0.20.04.1
xul-ext-calendar-timezones - 1:115.6.0+build2-0ubuntu0.20.04.1
xul-ext-gdata-provider - 1:115.6.0+build2-0ubuntu0.20.04.1
xul-ext-lightning - 1:115.6.0+build2-0ubuntu0.20.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '121.0+build1-0ubuntu0.20.04.1').
thunderbird package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:115.6.0+build2-0ubuntu0.20.04.1').
mozjs52 package in esm-apps/focal is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs68 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
